snippet: The Titanic exhibition in Belfast opened late last month, promising the world's largest display of materials on the ship built and launched from the city 100 years ago. But for Titanic buffs who can't make the trip to Ireland, a few exhibitions on...
abstract: The Titanic exhibition in Belfast opened late last month, promising the world's largest display of materials on the ship built and launched from the city 100 years ago. But for Titanic buffs who can't make the trip to Ireland, a few exhibitions on our shores promise a look at the now mythic voyage.

headline.main: A Look Back 100 Years To Focus on the Titanic
